```{r}
ChHlthSurvey1 <- ChHlthSurvey %>%
  select(c(DIABETES, DIABETES_CURR, PHYSACTIV, FOODSIT, FPL_I1, FPL_I2, FPL_I3, FPL_I4, FPL_I5, FPL_I6, ACE1, K11Q61, K11Q62, SC_RACE_R, BIRTH_YR)) %>%
  mutate(DIABETES_CASE = ifelse(DIABETES == 1 & DIABETES_CURR == 1, 1, 0)) %>%
  mutate(FPL_MIN = 
           pmin(FPL_I1, FPL_I2, FPL_I3, FPL_I4, FPL_I5, FPL_I6, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(POV = ifelse(FPL_MIN < 100 | ACE1 == c(4,3) & FOODSIT == c(4,3), 1, 0)) 
```
